text: Very small bus stop along a very tight and crowded street. Gets a little annoying if you were waiting for your bus for a longer than expected time. Also doesn't help the claustrophobia with the line of restaurants behind the bus stop, and the bus in front of you passing by with the sound of engine in your face.

The bus frequency is very frequent, and you donâ€™t need to wait for a long time. There is a bus every few minutes. It is very convenient and a very good station. There are restaurants, massage parlors, and health centers around the station...
